script.name: plugin.salv.al.ship.cfg
script.description: Create and configure a random NPC salvager ship

line.comment: * - - - JJ - Set morale, skill and agression
* Randomly decide whether ship can claim, enslave and/or collect crates and
* install/remove software to fit this setup
* write to player logbook: printf: fmt='SCS = %s, rand = %s, scs.amt = %s, canClaim = %s', $scs.ware, $rand, $scs.amt, $canClaim, null
* Get name id depending on ship config
* Else all rands failed, so create a ship salvager as default
* Salvage Claim Software installation failed, create slaver
* Else couldn't fit ecells so expand cargo capacity to max and try again
* Still couldn't fit ecells, so remove them to make way for something else

sval.val: Create and configure a random NPC salvager ship
- - - JJ - Set morale, skill and agression
Randomly decide whether ship can claim, enslave and/or collect crates and
install/remove software to fit this setup
write to player logbook: printf: fmt='SCS = %s, rand = %s, scs.amt = %s, canClaim = %s', $scs.ware, $rand, $scs.amt, $canClaim, null
Get name id depending on ship config
Else all rands failed, so create a ship salvager as default
Salvage Claim Software installation failed, create slaver
Else couldn't fit ecells so expand cargo capacity to max and try again
Still couldn't fit ecells, so remove them to make way for something else
